TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 982
TEI.2.document_title: Felix H. Walker to Stephen F. Austin, 12-03-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 982

div1.p: Know all men by these present that whareas Robe[r]t H William[s] has received to me the sum of three hundred and Twenty dollars in three Equal anual payment I hereby transfer and set over to him my Eight and Claim to the services of a Certain negro man named Hary for the Time of three Years from the date of these present given under my hand and seal this 3rd day of Decemb 1824
For value recd I transfer the within to Stephen F. Austin San Felipe de Austin Novr. 15,1825
